content.description: Move up under the roof and jam out to the lip, being mindful of rope drag. Turn the lip for plenty more glory hand jams on a steep wall. Rap to the cave.
content.location: From inside the cave a crack curves under the roof out to daylight.

content.description:
P-1 5.10d 80'  Step up to the first bolt and the fun begins. Several hard face moves past several bolts delivers you to some angled ramps and into a roof. Traverse under the roof to a hard exit and a belay ledge. 7 bolts.

P-2 5.11b 90'  Follow bolts up a groove where the wall steepens. Several small cams work here getting you to the crux bolt. Thin sharp edges on superb rock eases to great face climbing and a large ledge. Rap the route.  10 bolts, cams .2-.5"      A short pitch above this anchor goes to the top of the Bastion, app. 5.8 with 3 or 4 bolts. From here you can do a diagonal rap to the start of Phantom.
content.location: Starts on the left side of the Bastion. Scramble up a grassy gully and belay below the first bolt. A 2" cam works here.

content.description: After passing the lip, move right to a line of bolts. The crux is about halfway and there are some wire placements, maybe even small cams. Haven't done this one so not sure of the specifics.
content.protection: wires, small cams, med. cams thru the roof.
content.location: Start on Morning Glory and traverse right after the lip.

content.description: Stand on the tip of a large boulder where the crack begins. Get a few cam placements and launch off into the diagonal hand crack. Continue for app. 20' where it eases off and the rock steepens. Look up to see a bolt and some hard face climbing past it. Easier face climbing angles to the right past bolts and to the large cave belay.  App. 6 bolts, cams .75-3"
content.location: Around the corner from Gargoyle on a separate block.

content.description:
P-1 5.9 90'  Follow the bolt line up and right on ramps and ledges to an alcove belay.      Single rack

P-2 5.9 80'  Chose who gets this lead. The thin horizontal finger crack takes you right to the edge of the cliff. Great exposure as you move onto the face to follow several bolts to the anchor. Small cams.  Rap the route.
content.location: Far right side of the Bastion. From the cave ,scramble down a chute to the base of the route. If coming up from Dig Dug do some 5th class scrambling to the one bolt anchor.

content.description: Don't have too much info on this one but it is in the 5.10 range and is burly.
content.location: To the right of Draw Bridge , obvious wide crack.
